posts.title: ERCOT Battery Monitor 2024: Market Analysis and Revenue Trends
posts.description: The ERCOT energy storage market has experienced significant transformation in 2024, with revenue dropping from $18/kW-month to $7/kW-month. This analysis examines the key trends and their implications for battery storage operators.
